components.light

Class DirectionalLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Component
      • components.light.DefaultLightComponent
        • components.light.DirectionalLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, DirectionalLight, Light, Invalidatable

    public class DirectionalLightComponent
extends DefaultLightComponent
implements DirectionalLight
    Basic implementation of a directional light source. It offers you methods for frustum culling which can be useful for shadow mapping.
    See Also:
    GameObject, isInsideFrustum(Vector3f position, float radius)

        public DirectionalLightComponent(@NotNull

                                 @NotNull
                                 org.joml.Vector3f specular,
                                 @NotNull
                                 org.joml.Vector3f ambient)
        Initializes a new DirectionalLightComponent to the given values. All of the parameters's components must be min. 0.
        Parameters:
        diffuse - diffuse color
        specular - specular color
        ambient - ambient color

    • Method Detail

      • isInsideFrustum

        public boolean isInsideFrustum(@NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f position,
                               float radius)
        Returns true if the sphere (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside. Note that if frustum culling is disabled, or this Component isn't connected to a GameObject this method always returns true.
        Parameters:
        position - position
        radius - radius
        Returns:
        false if the sphere is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - position can't be null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - radius can't be negative
        See Also:
        Settings.isFrustumCulling()

      • isInsideFrustum

        public boolean isInsideFrustum(@NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f aabbMin,
                               @NotNull
                               org.joml.Vector3f aabbMax)
        Returns true if the axis alligned bounding box (determined by the given parameters) is inside, or intersects the frustum and returns false if it is fully outside. Note that if frustum culling is disabled, or this Component isn't connected to a GameObject this method always returns true.
        Parameters:
        aabbMin - the axis alligned bounding box's minimum x, y and z values
        aabbMax - the axis alligned bounding box's maximum x, y and z values
        Returns:
        false if the bounding box is fully outside the frustum, true otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - the parameters can't be null
        See Also:
        Settings.isFrustumCulling()

      • refresh

        private void refresh()
        Refreshes this Component's data if it's invalid.

      • getProjectionViewMatrix

        @Nullable
 @ReadOnly
public org.joml.Matrix4f getProjectionViewMatrix()
        Returns the light's projection view matrix. If this Component isn't connected to a GameObject, this method returns null.
        Returns:
        the light's projection view matrix
